title: How to Get Warm
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>.....Achoo! Eeek~ It‚Äôs cold~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Chika-chan, won‚Äôt we be late to practice if you don‚Äôt get up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>But it‚Äôs so cold. I want to go to practice, but I don‚Äôt want to go outside~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hmm...... Oh, I got it! Chika-chan, can I tickle you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Why Ruby-cha‚Äî<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Tickle, tickle~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahahaha! Hold on, Ruby-cha...... Ahaha, ahahahaha!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>So? Are you warm now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>...... Hmm, I‚Äôm not cold anymore! Good job, Ruby-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hooray~ ùÖ† Just let me know if you get cold again. I can tickle you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
